attributes.action: Make Parliament scrap two old laws before introducing any new one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are far too many laws for the legal system to work properly. The New Labour government add about two more each week.
Lets scrap two old laws for each new one so that only the sensible laws remain.

rejection.details: Your petition is already online http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/outoutin/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
